name: hrm-system
description: Решение домашнего задания в рамках прохождения FE School T-Systems 2018

scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.install:all: (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start"

author: AlexanderFSP
